ItemBase.Description: Left over debris from mining. Debris cannot be refined but can be sold for a small sum to most merchants.

ItemBase.Name: Wreckage Slag
ItemBase.Description: Slag from a wrecked ship that can be sold for a small profit.

ItemBase.Name: Bot Product Catalog
ItemBase.Description: InfinitiCorp products are the best in the galaxy! Buy InfinitiCorp and you'll propel you and your family into the future!

ItemBase.Name: Mark Series Manual
ItemBase.Description: GETCo Mark-Series of bots are well tested to make sure we keep up our 500-year tradition of sustainable development.

ItemBase.Name: Drone Actuator
ItemBase.Description: A non functional drone actuator. This would fetch a nice price from a local vendor.

ItemBase.Name: GetCo artifact G2
ItemBase.Description: A bent "American Impress" credit card from 2106. Cut half through with scissors. Name on surface: Lloyd Fernherb.

ItemBase.Name: Ceresite
ItemBase.Description: Refines to: Cerium

ItemBase.Name: Piece of the Head of the Merus Milia Captain
ItemBase.Description: Contains genetic material assumed to be an abnormal Progen iteration.

ItemBase.Name: Dark Matter Enriched Minervite
ItemBase.Description: Refines to: Dark Matter Enriched Minervium

ItemBase.Name: Derfresser Phlegm
ItemBase.Description: Mucous from a Derfresser.

ItemBase.Name: Glamour Goo
ItemBase.Description: A bit of internal 'goo' from a Dish Dancer.

ItemBase.Name: Brawn Cord
ItemBase.Description: Fibrous muscle material from a Brawn entity.

ItemBase.Name: Nazari Plate
ItemBase.Description: Exoskelton Plate from a Nazari.

ItemBase.Name: Filthy Beaker
ItemBase.Description: This beaker is crusted with chemical compounds. The surface is pitted and deformed from improper use.

ItemBase.Name: Gull Wing
ItemBase.Description: A wing dropped from a storm gull.

ItemBase.Name: Vacuum Stalk Root
ItemBase.Description: The roots of a Risco Vacuum Stalk.

ItemBase.Name: Chocolate
ItemBase.Description: Sweet delicacy made from cocoa beans. Enjoyed by all.\n\nChocolate is in demand at Mercury Station (Glory's Orbit, Beta Hydri System).

ItemBase.Name: Eggs
ItemBase.Description: Fresh, free-range eggs from non-cloned chickens. Gourmets insist there is a difference in taste.\n\nEggs are in demand at Mercury Station (Glory's Orbit, Beta Hydri System).

ItemBase.Name: Singularity Soda
ItemBase.Description: A GETCo-created drink. It is very popular throughout the entire galaxy.

ItemBase.Name: Drone System
ItemBase.Description: Some system recovered from a destroyed drone. Nothing able to be used but these could easily be sold for scrap.

ItemBase.Name: Porata Scale
ItemBase.Description: Scale from a Porata.

ItemBase.Name: Porata Mandible
ItemBase.Description: Mandible from a Porata.

ItemBase.Name: Vodka
ItemBase.Description: The finest Russian vodka. A favorite among EarthCorps personnel.\n\nVodka is in demand at EarthCorps High Command (Zweihander, Alpha Centauri System) and Jagerstadt (Zweihander Planet, Alpha Centauri System).

ItemBase.Name: Centuriata Praefect Gene-Map
ItemBase.Description: This strange object contains a Centuriata Praefect's gene-map. Progen Sentinels will often pay a high price to have such objects returned to their keeping.

ItemBase.Name: Raw Tiberium Crystal
ItemBase.Description: Refines to: Tiberium

ItemBase.Name: Energy Cannon
ItemBase.Description:
Energy Cannon
This device is roughly a mix of a beam and projectile weapon.
You can use it to disrupt Ships engaged in prospecting or cause actual damage if you hit close enough
